item.title: AVELUMAB
item.description:
DrugBank ID: db11945
DrugCentral: avelumab
Synonymous : None


Drug Sentece Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of avelumab gene in 3 abstracts.

pmid sentence
27544053 Antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity (ADCC) of avelumab, a fully humanized immunoglobulin G1 anti PD-L1 antibody against primary mesothelioma cell lines, was evaluated in presence of autologous and allogeneic natural killer cells. […] Of the three primary mesothelioma cell lines tested, two were susceptible to avelumab-mediated ADCC in the presence of autologous natural killer cells. […] In addition, mesothelioma tumor cells are susceptible to ADCC by the anti-PD-L1 antibody avelumab.
30605211 To assess the efficacy and safety of avelumab in a cohort of patients with previously treated mesothelioma. […] Participants received avelumab, 10 mg/kg, every 2 weeks until disease progression, unacceptable toxic effects, or withdrawal from the study. […] Of 53 patients treated with avelumab, the median age was 67 (range, 32-84) years; 32 (60%) were male. […] Avelumab showed durable antitumor activity and disease control with an acceptable safety profile in a heavily pretreated cohort of patients with mesothelioma.
30788836 We analyzed the United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) Adverse Event Reporting System (FAERS) database for pembrolizumab, atezolizumab, nivolumab, ipilimumab, avelumab, and durvalumab 2 years prior their FDA approval until December 31, 2017, to include all cases with confirmed diagnosis/relapse of MS.
